text:
YO my boi AVINASH aka SNOOPY aka MOUNTAIN MAN,
Dhadkan dhadkan dhadkan dhadkan, mein teri baho ke jhule mein pali babul jaa rahi ho chodd ke teri gali babul, 
khubsurat yeh jamane yaad aayengey, chaaha kar bhi hum tume na bhul payengey....................... Avinash the first thing I remember is about the incident of the Manali where we got in a brawl with the fat uncle and at that time I saw your aggression like " Gand mein danda dal dunga" and I was like bc yeh itna saara courage kaha see le aaya, from that moment whenever I was with you I felt safe ki agar yeh banda saath mein hai toh apna koi kuch nhi bigaad sakta.

All the four years of our journey was very engaging like you were one of them who was very close to me and very openly I can share anything. we played volleyball a lot, cricket too.
Aur who last ke 2 hafte jo cricket khelne mein maza aaya hai who sabse alag level ka tha brother. "Avinash Out ho ja warna Pandey aaa jaega!!!". I also remember that we have gone to Z square and Ravemoti mall quite a few times.

Aur haa bhai ek se ek movie dekhane wale bande ho tum, aur aagey bhi ummed hai tum apni favourite movies bhejte rahogey.
What I like most about you and I have to learn from you is "How cool you are in every situation? and how easily you conversate with anyone, beautiful, amazing yar". Please please give me that formula Bhai. Never saw you shouting on anyone around me, hardly I can remember. You are open to suggestions from everyone around you. Highly enthusiastic Guy.

Bas ek advice hai hamari taraf se ki:-  be curious man!!! Try to learn and explore new things and start reading books!!!

Overall sum up karein toh, like likhne ko toh bhaut kuch hai....., You was a friend that one would have wished for. Remember You are my BIG BROTHER (bade bhaiiyan). 

Abb to IES ki prep kar rahe ho toh, Give your everything. I want you to succeed and reach greater heights in life

By your 
BABA BOI

P.S.- I will be there for you always buddy!!! and when we will next time, will do that pitch experiment on youðŸ™‚ aur yaar who Zohra Zabi reh gaya karte hai use bhi

author: Vansh  Mittal

text:
Yo JASSI BOI,
Bc muje day 1 of IITK se pata tha tu kuch banega apne college mein aur akir kar tu bana GENSEC. Now let me tell you why I thought about that, starting se u were pretty much involved in taking the positions like muje yaad hai jab harlem shake kia tha u were leading the group and then dozeball you were captain and at that time I was like isme leadership qualities hai bc and then wing wala kuch tha u and saurav, I think wing coordinator, LOL muje yad nhi hai.

"bhai bhai plz mera TA banade" bhaut randirona kia tha TA ke course mein. I can remember monday ko apna TA hua karta tha and hum do chutiye raat bar TT khelke 4 baje TA banane baith te they and poori raat randirona karte they, thanks to tushar woh jaldi banaleta tha.
First year mein then apun kaffi time CC mein pada karte they mid-sem and end-sem both, suraj bhi apne saath hi tha. Fir bc raat ko doaa canteen jaatein they and I can remember ur words:- " yaar mein abhi addha ghanta so raha, 30 min hotein hi uta dena" and after 30min u know what was your reaction, "abhe 30 min hogaye itni jaldi, abhi aur thoda 5 min sone de"

aur bhai first year mein koi class lagai bhi this kya apun ne, bc math ki class toh 3:45 pe saath jaatein they attendance lagane, who attendance wale bhaiya bolte they "ki bhaiya app toh lecture hall mein they hi nhi " and we were like "bhaiya hum piche they attendance aai hi nhi waha tak"

Aur wing ke sath volleyball khelna aur apun saath mein TT toh bhaut pela hai sala jo bhi senior aata tha sabko pela hai.

Aur bhaiya humein bhi tips dedo GF wagerah banane ke, ek kitab likho tum bhai, bestseller ban hi jayegi, ROMANCE+ACTION+THRILLERf, LoL.......

Bhai aap itna workout kaise karlete ho, humein enlighten karo, itna enthusiastic ho aap is field mein, bc football se lekar volleyball se lekar cycling trips that u had, brilliant yar. EK bar apun ko bhi chalna hai trip pe PLAN banao JASSI boi. Aur chapu toh tum ho hi paidaishi ...bc apne 3year mein GEN-SEC ban gyaa, aur 2nd year mein bc 3year ke launde ko election mein hara dia.....wah bete wah....it will be written down in the history of IITK..ki ek launda aaya tha patiala se m** chod ke chala gaya

Aur last mein hamare GYM trainer bane they bhai aap, "Gand aur chatti thodi si bar nikal...."  LOL...

ek advice bas yahi dunga :- Keep exploring and learning new-new stuffs and start reading a book!!!
aur abb placement aa rahe hai toh badiya se prepare karo aur result toh redundant hi hai ki usme bhi tum chapogey hi!! 
jadli milte hain bhai, till then wish u a lot of success in life and remember "SAB YAAD RAKHA JAAEGA"

FROM-
BABA BOI

P.S:- bhai TT khelte hai jab milengey!! Aur trip ka plan banao

text:
Yo UJJU mere dost,
BASKI CHAMP
Bhai kya bolu yar, ek aisa teacher jiske saarey concept hamesha clear kardeta tha.
MERI CPI ka credit tumhe hi dunga, quiz ho, midsem ho, endsem ho sabme tumne muje bhaut acche se padhaya hai, bilkul selflessly yar kya ho tum bhaiyaji, u r great
Abey MSE ki labs mein itni backchodi muje nhi lagta hoga kisi ne ki hogi be........saala TA log bhi haste they ki bc kaha aatein hai yeh log......Experiment accha tha ki group mein hotein they varna solo hotein toh gand fat jati....... 
Bhai thanks to you ki tu muje subah subah uta ke lea jaata tha, bhai uske liye teh dil se dhnyaawaad!!!
Tu bhai bhaut down to earth banda hai, bilkul koi attitude nhi, hamesha madad karne ko taiyyar,  always remaining calm and cool and thanks to you ki tumne muje stock market mein ghussne ka idea dia.
Mein tumhe kabhi nhi bulunga....... "SAB YAAD RAKHA JAAEGA BHAI"
YAAD hai H3PL mein saath mein they tum toh bc bade heavy bowler ho, kya bowling karte ho!!! Final har gaye they, LOL
Yar tumhara room yaad aaega bc sarey subject tumne ek dum clear kardiye they!! aur baki abhi toh touch mein rehte hi hain aur agey bhi rahengey

Bhai solar ke course mein toh yar ganda katta tha .......

Ab tumhare placement aarahe hai acche se prepare karo, aur chapp toh tum dogey hi
Keep exploring new stuffs and Always try to learn something new and read books (start apne hi karwaya tha)



Just one msg or phone call away bhai !!!
author: Vansh  Mittal

text:
Haa be NUNNNU,
Agar tuje yeh lagta hai ki mein tuje bhul gaya hu, ya fir I don't have any bond with you then you are wrong.
Mein kisi ko phn nhi lagata, but iska yeh matlab nhi hai ki mein tuje bhul gaya.....You will be remembered......SAB YAAD RAKHA JAEGA
Btw I always or u can say, daily I remember you, because I HATE YOU, LOL........
I think I don't have to describe the memories here or the bond, 
Because I think the bond between is just so pure that we just need to give time to each other.... every time we met just forget this last 2 months where we haven't given much time to each other or it's just you know, like the more time we share with each other the more the bond reveals, like how we are...........

FEW THINGS where I think where you can improve yourself and me too, this is what I think, It's only my thinking, maybe I am wrong:-
-1) Keep that fucking mobile away plz when everybody is around you please.....that's why I hate you
-2) Try exploring new things, learn new stuff, I personally don't know what you do, but if you are not doing then plz do buddy
-3) Kissi ki baton mein itna jaldi Vishwas mat kiya kar, don't believe them until you are fully sure, like just an example the case of me telling you during the placement about a girl.......LOL....It's easy to make you fool
-4) Be curious, to be honest I am also not that much curious but be, becoz I don't know where it will take you.
-5) Is the same as just point 2 and 4, don't fucking waste your time buddy, I am not the expert in this, u also don't know what miracles you can do with this time, as lot of things are going in the world, this world is full of knowledge
-6) You always consider yourself poor in dancing, but I just want to say that you don't have to think what others think about you, feel the moment and enjoy, whatever the steps are coming out let it be you don't have to do just for impressing others but you are doing for yourself, dancing is just an example, it is applicable in general
-7) be inspiring because it affects a lot of people surrounding you..............


Matlab zyada kuch nhi hai bas thoda bhaut hi hai, baaki you know yourself much better, please don't consider this as a lecture, this is just feedback from my side, and please feel free to give a feedback to me, because I fucking want it.

aur yeh mein tuje memoirs par nhi likh raha becoz apun ki memories koi ek do nhi hai bhaut sari hai jo ki waha byan nhi ho sakti......only that can be cherished

I want you to achieve what you want in life, your journey should be inspiring for me and all out there......
You have the fucking great potential, you can create miracles buddy.

Bas abb yeh padkar phone mat karna, I will not be able to pickup the call, becoz I'm fucking busy, LOL........ I'm serious reflect on this or consider this as a piece of trash, LOL
I am waiting for the feedback from your side, would love to hear from you

Few of the Good things which I can think about you is, and there many but I am able to list down only a few:-
-1) Caring
-2) Joyful
-3) Fantastic badminton, TT, and volleyball player, the way you give your 100% is a literally awesome buddy
-4) You have the ability to become a great teacher, the way you make difficult things easy to digest,
-5) You are highly confident when you speak and you are very smooth in starting conversation or just to say that You are a great public speaker
-6) Your logical skills are far better than the people out there
-7) You are great at the debate, difficult or very tough to defeat you
-8) compassionate

aur bhi hai yeh bas abhi yehi yaad aa raha 

chill hai milte hai jaldi, karte raho apna kaam,
 the more you get success in your life the more I will get happiness 

bye bye

Disclaimer:- these are just my thoughts, they are don't mean to be hurt. If this make you sad or angry please don't be. You don't have to give the fuck about this trash
SAB YAAD RAKHA JAEGA
